div.h4: You can zoom in and out
div.h5:
If it is hard to see the task, you can try to zoom in or out:
• Zoom in by pressing down 'Ctrl', while clicking on '+'
• Zoom out by pressing down 'Ctrl', while clicking '-'
div.h6: Try to zoom in and out until you think it looks good. Click on , when everyone in the class has tried it. Your teacher will tell you when to continue.
